title: Valuable Business Operator
description: As a wealthy former facchino who now operates six of the Consiglio's properties, our relationship is characterized by significant business interdependence despite a notable lack of trust (-24.54 TrustScore). While the strength of our connection is substantial (887.07 StrengthScore) due to our extensive business dealings, the Consiglio likely views me with the calculated wariness befitting their vigilant nature, particularly given my unusual social position and wealth that defies typical Venetian hierarchies.
